TextLang.Text: A connection error has occurred. The WLAN switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. The WIRELESS switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the access point.
Communication with the server failed. A DNS error has occurred.
A connection error has occurred. The signal may be weak.
A connection error has occurred. Please try again.
If you perform the update, the data for [Resume Game] will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Connection to the server failed. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
Currently, the server may be down for maintenance or updating. Please try again later.
To update this game, a system software update for the PSP™ system is required. Do you want to cancel the current update operation for the game and perform a system software update?
This game is the latest version.
Update data for this game has been found. Do you want to perform the update?
Checking for update data... Please wait.

The expire date could not be extended. You can also extend the expire date by accessing PlayStation®Store on a PS3™ system or from the Media Go™ application and then selecting this game from [%1] again.
